name: IT201_Sprint3
description:
The app creates 3D objects when the user interacts with it. The user can change the type of objects spawned, the color of the objects and the size of the objects. Right click to draw. Use dropdown list to select object type. Use sliders to change scale and colors. Buttons can be used to change color value to maximum if not already maximum or zero if at maximum. Some commands can be down on keyboard. Toggles to randomize attributes.

M- hides UI

1-5 cycle through shape dropdown

F5 clears all objects
